data.text: Wee Jehova-rĩ, ririkana maũndũ marĩa matũkorete;
Igai riitũ nĩrĩneanĩtwo kũrĩ ageni,
Nĩtũtuĩkĩte ciana cia ngoriai na ciana itarĩ na maithe,
Maaĩ marĩa tũnyuuaga no tũgũrire;
Arĩa matũingatithagia marĩ o magũrũ-inĩ maitũ;
Twĩneanĩte kũrĩ andũ a Misiri na a Ashuri
Maithe maitũ nĩmehirie na rĩu matirĩ ho,
Ngombo nĩcio itwathaga,
Tuonaga irio na ũndũ wa gũtwarĩrĩria mĩoyo iitũ ũgwati-inĩ,
Gĩkonde giitũ kĩhiũhĩte o ta riiko rĩa kũruga mĩgate,
Andũ-a-nja nĩmanyiitĩtwo na hinya gũkũ Zayuni,
Anene akuo nĩ macuurĩtio na moko mao;
Aanake marutithagio wĩra wa hinya ithĩi-inĩ;
Athuuri nĩmatigĩte gũikara kĩhingo-inĩ gĩa itũũra inene;
Ngoro ciitũ nĩithirĩte gĩkeno;
Thũmbĩ ya ũnene5:16 Thũmbĩ yonanagia riiri na gĩtĩĩo (Isa 28:1, 3). nĩĩgwĩte, ĩgatuuma mũtwe,
Tondũ ũcio ngoro ciitũ nĩiringĩkĩte;
tondũ wa Kĩrĩma gĩa Zayuni, kĩrĩa gĩkirĩte ihooru,
Wee Jehova-rĩ, wathanaga nginya tene;
Ũriganagĩrwo nĩ ithuĩ hĩndĩ ciothe nĩkĩ?
Wee Jehova-rĩ, tũcookererie harĩwe, nĩguo tũhote gũgũcookerera;
tiga ũkorirwo nĩũtũregeete biũ,
